learningContent.title: About glossary entry and glossary group topics

lcIntro.p: The glossary entry topic type answers the question "what?" Use a glossary entry topic to define a specific term or concept contained within your content.

A glossary entry contains a single term and definition, and are usually collected within a map in order to construct a glossary within a publication. A glossary group serves as a container for a series of glossary entries. You can use glossary groups to collect glossary entries that are closely related, or to organize them into discrete chunks.
